src:
Lokasi Kebakaran Gedung Hailai Dipasangi Garis Polisi
05 Nov 2019, 10:15 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - Api yang membakar Gedung Hailai tadi malam sudah padam. Garis polisi tampak dipasang di sekeliling lokasi gedung yang terbakar.
Pantuan detikcom, di Gedung Hailai, Ancol, Pademangan, Jakarta Utara, Selasa (5/11/2019), garis polisi terlihat dipasang di bagian pintu gedung. Garis polisi tersebut diikat di antara dua tiang.


Foto: Garis polisi dipasang di lokasi kebakaran gedung Hailai (Rolando/detikcom)

Petugas pemadam kebakaran (damkar) masih nampak bersiaga di sekitar dan dalam Gedung Hailai. Mesin pompa air di mobil damkar pun masih menyalurkan air ke dalam gedung untuk proses pendinginan.
"Iya (masih pendinginan), tapi sudah aman," ujar petugas tersebut.
Sisa-sisa kebakaran nampak berserakan di dalam dan luar gedung. Puing batu, kayu dan besi yang terlihat gosong berserakan di sekitar lokasi kebakaran.
Sebelumnya, kebakaran di Gedung Hailai terjadi pada Selasa (4/11) malam pukul 22.50 WIB. Api cepat menyambar hampir ke seluruh bangunan gedung.
"Api padam pukul 03.00 WIB. Sekarang dalam proses pendinginan," kata Kasudin Gulkarmat Jakarta Utara Satriadi Gunawan, saat dikonfirmasi, Selasa (5/11).

(rfs/haf)
text:
Fire Location of Hailai Building Is Lined With Police Lines
05 Nov 2019, 10:15 by Rolando Fransiscus Sihombing
Jakarta - The fire that burned down the Hailai Building last night was extinguished. Police lines appear to be installed around the location of the burning building.
Pantuan detikcom, at the Hailai Building, Ancol, Pademangan, North Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019), a police line was seen installed on the door of the building. The police line is bound between two poles.


Photo: Police line installed at the fire location of the Hailai building (Rolando / detikcom)

Firefighters (damkar) were still on standby around and within the Hailai Building. The water pump engine in the fire truck is still delivering water into the building for the cooling process.
"Yes (still cooling), but it is safe," said the officer.
The remnants of the fire seemed scattered inside and outside the building. Rubble of stone, wood and iron that looks charred scattered around the scene of the fire.
Previously, a fire at the Hailai Building occurred on Tuesday (11/4) night at 22.50 WIB. The fire quickly grabbed almost the entire building.
"The fire was extinguished at 03.00 WIB. Now it is in the process of cooling," Kasudin Gulkarmat of North Jakarta, Satriadi Gunawan, said when confirmed on Tuesday (11/5).

(rfs / haf)
